data.message: Eminem ..I don't want to sit here and battle you with a rhyme but I listen to you run your mouth for years and just like now you been wrong all the time ...... you got the game twisted everything you said Trump is doing is what Obama did times10 but you're so colorblind you just missed it  .... you got fake hate in your voice and a fake sound, by the way when is the last poor black guy you been around ??? ... it's OK you haven't sold an album in 4  years,  but to sell your soul on the BET awards for popularity just brought half your fans to tears  .... you want to talk shit now and give us the finger, you forgot when you were broke as hell licking KFC juice off your friends fingers ...... You use to spit real toughness out your mouth , now you sold out to Hollywood liberal pressure and now only their words are coming out your mouth .... that's OK 80 million strong are not going to stand with you,  and when your popularity is in the dirt let's see how many of those fake brothers stand with you ... sad part is you don't even believe anything you saying, your now the slave to Minority world that's all I'm saying ... you sound weak and scared and you exposed all your pain , so if you're not going to be a leader yourself you might as well jump on the Trump train ... CHOO CHOO MOTHA FUCKA !!!
